name: Hyper Flight (itch)
description:
Hyper Flight!!!

Hyper Flight is a time attack, bullet hell, endless flying game. Keep up your speed, or run out of gas, but as you go faster, flying will become more chaotic. Destroy enemies and hit collectables to rack up the points. Maybe you can be in the top ten of all fliers!!!

***Installing***

Unzip the download and click on the Hyper Flight.exe to play. Check out the How to play document to learn how to play.

*** How To Play***

--Controls--

Navigate menus with WASD and enter or use a mouse.

Control your flight with WASD.

use SHIFT or left mouse button to use your boost if you have any (See top left of UI)

Boosting into enemies or their bullets will destroy them and score you extra points.

--Rules--

Collect Time Crystals to add time to your flight.

If you run out of time, you will fall out of the sky.

If you hit the ground your flight is over.

Hitting enemies or their projectiles will remove time from your flight.

Collect Omegas (Horse Shoe Type Thing) to get boosts you can use with SHIFT or left mouse button.

Collect Chevrons (Pointy Blue things) to get an instant boost.

If your speed gets too slow, you will lose time faster. Keep an eye on your speed bar at the bottom of the screen. If it starts to turn red you are going to slow.

--Scoring--

Getting Collectables will score you points. Chevrons are the most valuable, followed by Omegas, and Time Crystals. Destroying enemies and their projectiles will also score you more points.
